_meta.description: DigiList color tokens based on Designsystemet.no with blue (#33649E) as primary accent
_meta.note: All color values come from Designsystemet.no. Only accent choice (#33649E) is defined here. This is not 'creating a new blue design' - it's using Designsystemet.no fully and choosing #33649E as primary accent within the system's allowed usage.

usage.primary: #33649E - Primary buttons, main CTA (white text ≥ 4.5:1 contrast)
usage.primary_subtle: #E6EEF7 - Selected elements, chips, backgrounds (dark text ≥ 4.5:1 contrast)

rules.brand_blue_not_semantic: Brand blue ≠ semantic info blue. Status must always have icon + text.
rules.no_custom_colors: No custom color palettes outside the brand accent
